
    <h2 class="postTitle"><a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/OBCE666/p/18929418" title="å‘å¸ƒäº 2025-06-15 13:38">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">DBA å¿…çŸ¥å¿…ä¼š&nbsp;â€”â€”&nbsp;OB 4.x ç‰ˆæœ¬å¦‚ä½•æŸ¥è¯¢ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´å ç”¨æƒ…å†µï¼Ÿ</span>
    

</a>
</h2>
    <div class="postText">    <div id="cnblogs_post_description" style="display: none">
        
        çŒ®ç»™æ‰€æœ‰æ­£åœ¨äº†è§£ OBï¼Œä»¥åŠå‡†å¤‡å¯¹ OB è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•çš„æœ‹å‹ä»¬ã€‚
    </div>
<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<blockquote>
<p>é¦–å…ˆä¸ºå¤§å®¶æ¨èè¿™ä¸ª OceanBase å¼€æºè´Ÿè´£äººè€çºªçš„å…¬ä¼—å· â€œè€çºªçš„æŠ€æœ¯å” å—‘å±€â€ï¼Œä¼šæŒç»­æ›´æ–°å’Œ #<strong>æ•°æ®åº“</strong>ã€#<strong>AI</strong>ã€<strong>#æŠ€æœ¯æ¶æ„</strong> ç›¸å…³çš„å„ç§æŠ€æœ¯å†…å®¹ã€‚æ¬¢è¿æ„Ÿå…´è¶£çš„æœ‹å‹ä»¬å…³æ³¨ï¼</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ç¯‡çº¯è¿ç»´å‘çš„æ–‡ç« ã€‚</p>
<p>çŒ®ç»™æ‰€æœ‰æ­£åœ¨äº†è§£ OBï¼Œä»¥åŠå‡†å¤‡å¯¹ OB è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•çš„æœ‹å‹ä»¬ã€‚</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="èƒŒæ™¯">èƒŒæ™¯</h2>
<p>å‡†å¤‡å¯¹ OceanBase è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•çš„æœ‹å‹ä»¬ï¼Œä¸€å®šä¼šæµ‹ä¸€ä¸‹è¿™æ¬¾æ•°æ®åº“çš„é«˜å‹ç¼©æ¯”æ˜¯å¦å¦‚å®˜ç½‘ä¸Šæ‰€è¯´çš„è¿™ä¹ˆææ€–ã€‚<br>
ç›®å‰ï¼Œåœ¨ OceanBase å®˜ç½‘ä¸Šï¼Œè™½ç„¶å·²ç»æœ‰ 999+ ä¸ªä¸ â€œç£ç›˜å ç”¨ç©ºé—´â€ ç›¸å…³çš„å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œä½†ä¾ç„¶æ— æ³•é˜»ç¢ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨ OceanBase ç¤¾åŒºè®ºå›ä¸­æå‡º 999+ ä¸ªä¸ â€œç£ç›˜å ç”¨ç©ºé—´â€ ç›¸å…³çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚</p>
<p><img src="https://intranetproxy.alipay.com/skylark/lark/0/2025/png/132317/1742304536542-5d040628-cd0f-44b4-a8e4-9599c91faf29.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>ä¸ºäº†å‡è½» OceanBase ç¤¾åŒºè®ºå›å€¼ç­åŒå­¦çš„å·¥ä½œé‡ï¼Œä»Šå¤©ç®€å•æ•´ç†äº†ä¸€ç¯‡ä¸ â€œç£ç›˜å ç”¨ç©ºé—´â€ ç›¸å…³çš„æ–‡ç« ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™é‡Œå’Œå¤§å®¶åˆ†äº«ã€‚æ¬¢è¿å¤§å®¶åœ¨ç•™è¨€åŒºè¯„è®ºã€åæ§½ï¼Œä»¥åŠåˆç†åœ°å¯¹ä½œè€…è¿›è¡Œè°©éª‚ã€‚</p>
<blockquote>
<p>æ³¨æ„ï¼š</p>
<p>ä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­å‡ºç°çš„å‘½ä»¤ï¼Œéœ€è¦é€šè¿‡ sys ç§Ÿæˆ·ï¼Œåœ¨ oceanbase åº“ä¸­æ‰§è¡Œã€‚</p>
<p>æ–‡ä¸­å¯èƒ½ä¼šä¸åŒå…¶çƒ¦åœ°å¤‡æ³¨ï¼Œå¸Œæœ›è¯»è€…æœ‹å‹ä»¬èƒ½å¤Ÿå®½æ•æˆ‘çš„å•°å—¦ã€‚</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="æŸ¥è¯¢é›†ç¾¤å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´">æŸ¥è¯¢é›†ç¾¤å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´</h2>
<p>ä½¿ç”¨ sys ç§Ÿæˆ·ï¼Œåœ¨ oceanbase åº“ä¸­ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢å„ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç£ç›˜å ç”¨ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-sql">SELECT
  SVR_IP,
  DATA_DISK_IN_USE / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 AS USED_GB
FROM oceanbase.gv$ob_servers;

+--------------+----------------+
| SVR_IP       | USED_GB        |
+--------------+----------------+
| 12.345.67.89 | 0.300781250000 |
+--------------+----------------+
1 row in set (0.02 sec)
</code></pre>
<h2 id="æŸ¥è¯¢ç§Ÿæˆ·çš„çš„ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´">æŸ¥è¯¢ç§Ÿæˆ·çš„çš„ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´</h2>
<p>ä½¿ç”¨ sys ç§Ÿæˆ·ï¼Œåœ¨ oceanbase åº“ä¸­ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢æŒ‡å®šç§Ÿæˆ·çš„ç£ç›˜å ç”¨ã€‚éœ€è¦åœ¨ SQL ä¸­å¡«å†™ tenant_id = xxxï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-sql">SELECT svr_ip,
       svr_port,
       tenant_id,
       sum(used_size) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 AS used_gb
FROM oceanbase.__all_space_usage
WHERE tenant_id = xxx
  AND file_type IN ('tenant file data',
                    'tenant meta data',
                    'tenant tmp data')
GROUP BY svr_ip,
         svr_port;

+--------------+----------+-----------+----------------+
| svr_ip       | svr_port | tenant_id | used_gb        |
+--------------+----------+-----------+----------------+
| 12.345.67.89 |    22602 |      1002 | 0.026878356934 |
+--------------+----------+-----------+----------------+
</code></pre>
<h2 id="æŸ¥è¯¢-database-çš„çš„ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´">æŸ¥è¯¢ DataBase çš„çš„ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´</h2>
<p>ä½¿ç”¨ sys ç§Ÿæˆ·ï¼Œåœ¨ oceanbase åº“ä¸­ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢æŒ‡å®š database çš„ç£ç›˜å ç”¨ã€‚éœ€è¦åœ¨ SQL ä¸­å¡«å†™ tenant_id = xxxã€‚</p>
<p>è¿™é‡Œæœ‰å¿…è¦å¤šè§£é‡Šä¸€ä¸‹ä¸‹é¢è¿™æ¡ SQL ä¸­ sum èšåˆå‡½æ•°é‡Œçš„ case whenï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li>å¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ª sstable æ¯”è¾ƒå°çš„è¯ï¼Œå¤šä¸ª sstable ä¼šå…±ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ª 2 MB å®å—ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´çš„æ–¹å¼ä¼šæ¯”è¾ƒç‰¹æ®Šã€‚when b.nested_offset = 0 å°±æ˜¯ç”¨äºåˆ¤æ–­ sstable æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å° sstable çš„ã€‚
<ul>
<li>å¦‚æœæ™®é€š sstable çš„è¯ï¼ˆb.nested_offset = 0ï¼‰ï¼Œå°±ä½¿ç”¨ 2 MB * å®å—æ•°é‡ã€‚</li>
<li>å¦‚æœæ˜¯å° sstable çš„è¯ï¼ˆb.nested_offset != 0ï¼‰ï¼Œå°±ç›´æ¥ç”¨è¿™ä¸ª sstable çš„ sizeã€‚</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-sql">
SELECT /*+ query_timeout(30000000) */
  a.DATABASE_NAME,
  sum(CASE WHEN b.nested_offset = 0 
      THEN IFNULL(b.data_block_count + b.index_block_count + b.linked_block_count, 0) * 2 * 1024 * 1024
      ELSE IFNULL(b.size, 0) END) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 AS data_size_in_GB
FROM oceanbase.CDB_OB_TABLE_LOCATIONS a
     INNER JOIN oceanbase.__all_virtual_table_mgr b ON a.svr_ip = b.svr_ip
AND a.svr_port = b.svr_port
AND a.tenant_id = b.tenant_id
AND a.LS_ID = b.LS_ID
AND a.TABLET_ID = b.TABLET_ID
AND a.role = 'LEADER'
AND a.tenant_id = xxx
AND b.table_type &gt;= 10
AND b.size &gt; 0
GROUP BY a.DATABASE_NAME;

+---------------+-----------------+
| DATABASE_NAME | data_size_in_GB |
+---------------+-----------------+
| oceanbase     |  0.003973903134 |
| test          |  0.000002717599 |
| __recyclebin  |  0.000006728805 |
| mysql         |  0.000002369284 |
+---------------+-----------------+
4 rows in set (0.58 sec)
</code></pre>
<h2 id="æŸ¥è¯¢è¡¨çš„ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´">æŸ¥è¯¢è¡¨çš„ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´</h2>
<p>ä»¥ä¸‹ 4.x ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ sys ç§Ÿæˆ·ï¼Œåœ¨ oceanbase åº“ä¸­ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢æŒ‡å®š table çš„ç£ç›˜å ç”¨ã€‚</p>
<ul>
<li>**4.2.1 BPX &lt; 4.2.1 BP9 **</li>
<li><strong>4.2.2</strong></li>
<li><strong>4.3.x &lt; 4.3.2</strong></li>
</ul>
<p>éœ€è¦åœ¨ SQL ä¸­å¡«å†™ tenant_id = xxxï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸åŠ  database_name = 'xxx' AND table_name = 'xxx' æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºçš„ç»“æœåŒ…å«ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-sql">SELECT /*+ query_timeout(30000000) */ 
    a.TENANT_ID,
    a.DATABASE_NAME,
    a.TABLE_NAME,
    a.TABLE_ID,
    sum(CASE WHEN b.nested_offset = 0
        THEN IFNULL(b.data_block_count + b.index_block_count + b.linked_block_count, 0) * 2 * 1024 * 1024
        ELSE IFNULL(b.size, 0) END) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 AS data_size_in_GB
FROM CDB_OB_TABLE_LOCATIONS a
INNER JOIN __all_virtual_table_mgr b
      ON a.svr_ip = b.svr_ip
      AND a.svr_port = b.svr_port
      AND a.tenant_id = b.tenant_id
      AND a.LS_ID = b.LS_ID
      AND a.TABLET_ID = b.TABLET_ID
      AND a.role = 'LEADER'
      AND a.tenant_id = xxx
      AND b.table_type &gt;= 10
      AND b.size &gt; 0
-- WHERE database_name = 'xxx' AND table_name = 'xxx'
GROUP BY a.TABLE_ID;

+-----------+---------------+------------+----------+-----------------+
| TENANT_ID | DATABASE_NAME | TABLE_NAME | TABLE_ID | data_size_in_GB |
+-----------+---------------+------------+----------+-----------------+
|      1002 | test          | t1         |   500024 |  0.000000458210 |
+-----------+---------------+------------+----------+-----------------+
1 row in set (0.66 sec)
</code></pre>
<p>ä»¥ä¸‹ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œæ¨èä½¿ç”¨ä¸‹é¢è¿™ç§æ›´é«˜æ€§èƒ½æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹å¼ã€‚</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>4.2.1 BPX &gt;= 4.2.1 BP9</strong></li>
<li><strong>4.2.x &gt;= 4.2.3</strong></li>
<li><strong>4.3.x &gt;= 4.3.2</strong></li>
</ul>
<p>è¿™é‡Œä¹Ÿæœ‰å¿…è¦å¤šè§£é‡Šä¸€ä¸‹ä¸‹é¢è¿™æ¡ SQL ä¸­çš„ occupy_size å’Œ required_sizeã€‚</p>
<ul>
<li>occupy_sizeï¼šå¯ä»¥ç†è§£æˆ data_sizeï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå‹ç¼©åçš„æ•°æ®é‡å¤§å°ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ 2 GB æ•°æ®å‹ç¼©æˆäº† 1 MBï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªæ•°æ®çš„ occupy_size å°±æ˜¯ 1 MBã€‚</li>
<li>required_sizeï¼šå¯ä»¥ç†è§£æˆ used_sizeï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå®é™…ç»™æ•°æ®åˆ†é…çš„ç©ºé—´ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ 2G æ•°æ®å‹ç¼©æˆäº† 1 MBï¼Œç„¶åå ç”¨äº†ä¸€ä¸ªå®å—ï¼ˆä¸€ä¸ªå®å—çš„é»˜è®¤å¤§å° 2 MBï¼‰ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªæ•°æ®çš„ required_size = 2 MBã€‚</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="language-sql">-- æŸ¥æ™®é€šç”¨æˆ·è¡¨ï¼ˆéç³»ç»Ÿè¡¨ï¼‰
SELECT atnt.tenant_id AS TENANT_ID,
       avttl.table_id AS TABLE_ID,
       atnt.tenant_name AS TENANT_NAME,
       ad.database_name AS DATABASE_NAME,
       avt.table_name AS TABLE_NAME,
       sum(avtps.occupy_size) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 AS OCCUPY_SIZE_IN_GB,
       sum(avtps.required_size) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 AS REQUIRED_SIZE_IN_GB
FROM oceanbase.__all_virtual_tablet_pointer_status avtps
      INNER JOIN oceanbase.__all_virtual_tablet_to_ls avttl
            ON avttl.tenant_id = avtps.tenant_id
            AND avttl.tablet_id = avtps.tablet_id
      INNER JOIN oceanbase.__all_tenant atnt
            ON atnt.tenant_id = avttl.tenant_id
      INNER JOIN oceanbase.__all_virtual_table avt
            ON avt.tenant_id = avttl.tenant_id
            AND avt.table_id = avttl.table_id
      INNER JOIN oceanbase.__all_virtual_database ad
            ON ad.tenant_id = atnt.tenant_id
            AND ad.database_id = avt.database_id
      INNER JOIN oceanbase.__all_virtual_ls_meta_table avlmt
            ON avtps.tenant_id = avlmt.tenant_id
            AND avtps.ls_id = avlmt.ls_id
            AND avtps.svr_ip = avlmt.svr_ip
            AND avtps.svr_port = avlmt.svr_port
            AND avlmt.role = 1
WHERE atnt.tenant_id = 1002 AND database_name = 'test' AND table_name = 't2'
GROUP BY tenant_id,
         table_id
ORDER BY tenant_id,
         table_id
         \G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
          TENANT_ID: 1002
           TABLE_ID: 500024
        TENANT_NAME: mysql
      DATABASE_NAME: test
         TABLE_NAME: t1
  OCCUPY_SIZE_IN_GB: 0.000000458210 -- æ•°æ®å‹ç¼©åçš„çœŸå®å¤§å°
REQUIRED_SIZE_IN_GB: 0.000003814697 -- 4 MBï¼Œå®é™…å ç”¨äº†ä¸¤ä¸ªå®å—
1 row in set (0.32 sec)
</code></pre>
<h2 id="whats-more-">What's more ?</h2>
<p>ä» 4.3.4 ç‰ˆæœ¬å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå¼€å§‹æ”¯æŒä½¿ç”¨æ ‡å‡† CDB è§†å›¾æŸ¥è¯¢ç©ºé—´å ç”¨ã€‚è¿˜æ˜¯éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ sys ç§Ÿæˆ·ï¼Œåœ¨ oceanbase åº“ä¸­æŸ¥è¯¢ã€‚</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.oceanbase.com/docs/common-oceanbase-database-cn-1000000002014561" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">CDB_OB_TABLE_SPACE_USAGE</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://intranetproxy.alipay.com/skylark/lark/0/2025/png/132317/1742302469613-0f7490bc-90dc-44d2-8c63-bca21a8c49cf.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="language-sql">create table t1 (a int) ;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.278 sec)

select * from CDB_OB_TABLE_SPACE_USAGE\G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
    TENANT_ID: 1002
     TABLE_ID: 500024
  TENANT_NAME: mysql
DATABASE_NAME: test
   TABLE_NAME: t1
  OCCUPY_SIZE: 492
REQUIRED_SIZE: 4096
1 row in set (0.52 sec)
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.oceanbase.com/docs/common-oceanbase-database-cn-1000000002014555" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">CDB_OB_SERVER_SPACE_USAGE</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://intranetproxy.alipay.com/skylark/lark/0/2025/png/132317/1742302478889-1a9b994e-3a3e-4666-af9b-bf1966694fe1.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="language-sql">select * from CDB_OB_SERVER_SPACE_USAGE\G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
  TENANT_ID: 1
TENANT_NAME: sys
  SERVER_IP: 11.158.31.20

 DATA_BYTES: 1677562658
USAGE_BYTES: 1677562658
*************************** 2. row ***************************

  SERVER_IP: 11.158.31.20
SERVER_PORT: 22602
 SPACE_TYPE: Index Data
 DATA_BYTES: 1801
USAGE_BYTES: 16384
*************************** 3. row ***************************
  TENANT_ID: 1
TENANT_NAME: sys
  SERVER_IP: 11.158.31.20
SERVER_PORT: 22602
 SPACE_TYPE: Meta Data
 DATA_BYTES: 17129472
USAGE_BYTES: 17129472
*************************** 4. row ***************************
  TENANT_ID: 1
TENANT_NAME: sys
  SERVER_IP: 11.158.31.20

 SPACE_TYPE: Slog Data
 DATA_BYTES: 16629760
USAGE_BYTES: 16629760
*************************** 5. row ***************************
  TENANT_ID: 1

  SERVER_IP: 11.158.31.20

*************************** 6. row ***************************

  SERVER_IP: 11.158.31.20

</code></pre>

<p><img src="https://intranetproxy.alipay.com/skylark/lark/0/2025/png/132317/1742302406025-acdc3dfa-1dcd-4a2d-9dce-c191c626ad5e.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="language-sql">obclient&gt; select * from CDB_OB_SPACE_USAGE\G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
  TENANT_ID: 1

   ENDPOINT: NULL
       PATH: NULL
 SPACE_TYPE: Clog Data

   ENDPOINT: NULL
       PATH: NULL

<h2 id="é™„å½•">é™„å½•</h2>
<p>æœ€åé™„ä¸Šæœ¬æ–‡ä¸­å‡ºç°çš„ä¸€äº›ç³»ç»Ÿè¡¨çš„ç®€å•ä»‹ç»ï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li>__all_virtual_table_mgr
<ul>
<li>ç”¨äºé€šè¿‡ size å­—æ®µï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰ sstableã€memtable çš„ occupy_sizeã€‚</li>
<li>è¡¨åä¸­å¸¦ virtual å­—æ ·çš„éƒ½æ˜¯è™šæ‹Ÿè¡¨ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶å®æ—¶æ„å»ºã€‚æŸ¥è¿™å¼ è¡¨æ˜¯å‡†çš„ï¼Œä½†å¯èƒ½æ¯”è¾ƒæ…¢ã€‚</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>__all_virtual_tablet_meta_table
<ul>
<li>æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„ occupy_sizeï¼Œrequired_size æ˜¯åŸºçº¿ sstable çš„å¤§å°ã€‚</li>
<li>åªå±•ç¤ºåŸºçº¿ã€å¤šç‰ˆæœ¬åŸºçº¿çš„å¤§å°ï¼ˆæ²¡æœ‰è½¬å‚¨ sstable çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå’Œå…¶ä»–è¡¨çš„æ•°æ®é‡å¯¹ä¸ä¸Šæ˜¯ç¬¦åˆé¢„æœŸçš„ï¼‰ã€‚</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>__all_virtual_tablet_pointer_status
<ul>
<li>æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰ tablet ç›¸å…³çš„ä¿¡æ¯
<ul>
<li>occupy_sizeï¼štablet çš„ occupy_size</li>
<li>required_sizeï¼štablet çš„ required_size</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>__all_space_usage
<ul>
<li>å®ä½“è¡¨ï¼Œå®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå®šæ—¶æ›´æ–°ã€‚</li>
<li>å±•ç¤ºæ¯ä¸ª server ä¸Šçš„æ¯ä¸ªç§Ÿæˆ·ä¸åŒç±»å‹çš„ç©ºé—´å ç”¨ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚</li>
<li>tenant file data : ç§Ÿæˆ·ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰ tablet çš„ occupy_size æ€»å’Œã€‚</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p>ğŸ’Œ</p>
<blockquote>
